alert.note: Alert for Inland Miami-Dade County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 3:47PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade County through 415 PM EDT... At 346 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Shark Valley Obs Tower, or 17 miles northwest of The Redland, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Miami-Dade County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
